thread.section_title: WebsiteBox.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WebsiteBox.com | websitebox.com
thread.title: John C.

author: John C.
title: John C.
text: I've only been using Website Box for a week or so. It was recommended to me by my broker and his wife. The cost vs value seems to be much better than a monthly pay service. Rather than giving you an all inclusive for a monthly fee, they give you the basic for $99 and offer you add ons based on your needs. Either way, once you're set up, you won't have a monthly fee (at least not for now).
